00479         QPixmap                                      * m_smallIcons[IconCount];

00485 public:
00486         // WARNING: Don't store this pointer!
00487         // id == filename | number that indicates an internal pixmap
00488         // 0 stands for "any"
00489         QPixmap * getImage(const QString & szId, bool bCanBeNumber = true, QString * pRetPath = 0);
00490 
00491         // The returned pointer is owned by the icon manager
00492         // and can be deleted at any time : so don't store it
00493         KviCachedPixmap * getPixmapWithCache(const QString & szName);
00494 
00495         // The returned pointer is owned by the icon manager
00496         // and can be deleted at any time : so don't store it
00497         KviCachedPixmap * getPixmapWithCacheScaleOnLoad(const QString & szName, int iMaxWidth, int iMaxHeight);
00498 
00499         // The returned pointer is owned by the icon manager
00500         // and can be deleted at any time : so don't store it
00501         QPixmap * getPixmap(const QString & szName)
00502                 { KviCachedPixmap * pPix = getPixmapWithCache(szName); return pPix ? pPix->pixmap() : 0; };
00503 
00504         // this one never fails... if the image can't be found
00505         // a default 32x32 image is returned
00506         QPixmap * getBigIcon(const QString & szName);
00507 
00515         QPixmap * getSmallIcon(SmallIcon eIcon){ return eIcon < IconCount ? (m_smallIcons[eIcon] ? m_smallIcons[eIcon] : loadSmallIcon(eIcon) ) : 0; };
00516 
00524         QPixmap * getSmallIcon(int iIcon){ return iIcon < IconCount ? (m_smallIcons[iIcon] ? m_smallIcons[iIcon] : loadSmallIcon(iIcon)) : 0; };
